price: 3. Mpe ye, azali Allah oyo azali o likolo mpe na nsé,(1) ayebaka mabombami ma bino na maye bomonisaka polele. Mpe ayebi maye bozali kosala.
arabic: وَهُوَ ٱللَّهُ فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَفِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ يَعۡلَمُ سِرَّكُمۡ وَجَهۡرَكُمۡ وَيَعۡلَمُ مَا تَكۡسِبُونَ
footnotes: 1 Oye nde Allah bazali kobondela na likolo mpe na nsé.

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wahuwa al-lahu fī al-samāwāti wafī al-arḍi yaʿlamu sirrakum wajahrakum wayaʿlamu mā taksibūna
